desc: Bondeye Jewelry® is a sustainable brand based in NYC, made of 14K recycled gold & ethically mined stones. Bondeye Jewelry stays committed to honoring the core values of the brand – to design timeless, high quality, attainable, fine jewelry pieces that can be passed up, down, sideways – to all ages. Female run company.

layout.text: Just when you thought you had it all… there’s more!
